amendment.description: Amendment to require the Secretary of the Interior to include Federal lands as a part of its plan to address new demands for oil and gas pipelines.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part A of House Report 113-271 to require the Secretary of the Interior to include Federal lands as a part of its plan to address new demands for oil and gas pipelines.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Marino amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
